source:
今日のステージは決まった……。
あとは、開演を待つだけだ
translatedstr:
Today's stage has been decided. ......
Now all we have to do is wait for the show to start.

source:
『スプリングナイト』のメンバーは決まった。
みんな、頑張れ！
translatedstr:
The members of "Spring Night" have been decided.
Good luck, everyone!

source:
単独ライブのメンバーは決まった。
みんな、頑張れ！
translatedstr:
The members of the solo show have been decided.
Good luck, everyone!

source:

あとは、開演を待つだけだ
translatedstr:
It's their first audition, let them learn well. ......
Now all we have to do is wait for the show to start.

source:

メンバーは決まった。みんな、頑張れ！
translatedstr:

The members are set, good luck everyone!
